group_1.textCenter: all of you will be accompanying Lady Cornelia@to the banquet as her handmaidens!

group_1.textRight: Um, um, is that really okay…?

group_1.textLeft: Of course it is!
I've already given instructions to the other@handmaidens,
by impersonating Lady Cornelia's grand@chamberlain!

group_1.textCenter: I want to show the new girls what a dinner@party is like,
so you girls will stay here to tend to the villa.

group_1.textRight: That's some crazy good magic you've got,@Amaryllis★

group_1.textLeft: Yes, metamorphosis…@The magic of impersonation.

group_1.textRight: It doesn't just stop at you mimicking@appearances, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, the extra benefit is that while disguising@myself as another person...
Even if there are inconsistencies or things@that don't line up,
other people won't suspect a thing!

group_1.textRight: So like, if you should've been in a different place@than you actually are, they won't question it?
Meaning the story about the three new@handmaidens won't be in doubt.
The power to warp one's recognition of their@own surroundings is an awesome magic indeed.

group_1.textLeft: Hehe…@Still, it's not of any use in a fight.

group_1.textRight: …It isn't…?
Why would you have that sort of magic…?

group_1.textLeft: Indeed… Perhaps it's because of my love@for the Metamorphoses.
It's a work by the great poet Ovidius…

group_1.textRight: The Metamorphoses… It's a masterwork of@poetry themed around transformations.

group_1.textLeft: So it's been read by future generations…@How incredible!
Well then, Lady Cornelia, it's about time@we make our way to the banquet.
You guys better get ready to leave too,@Lady Himena!

group_1.textRight: Okies★
You'll be accompanying Junia, right?

group_1.textLeft: Well, after meeting someone selling oils,@Lady Junia left me behind…

group_1.textRight: [chara:102801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Even though you're her handmaiden?!

group_1.textLeft: So I will be accompanying you instead,@Lady Cornelia!
Seriously, though…
Their secret plan for an easy evacuation is@a dinner party Heart Event?

group_1.textRight: …What Amaryllis said makes sense, though.

group_1.narration: "Cornelia's father and Junia's foster father@are old friends. Both are among@the wealthiest merchants in Pompeii."
"And Marius, a childhood friend@of both Cornelia and Junia,@whom they admire like an older brother…"
"His family has a tremendous influence@on the city council, and the relationship@between their parents is in good standing."

group_1.textCenter: …And in the near future, the three houses@shall be united.
Lady Junia's presence is what will cement it.
He is a major ship owner who deals in wine.
And the family Lady Junia was taken into…@That is to say, her adopted father…
He is a wealthy owner and merchant@who made his fortune in winemaking.
So if Lady Junia, fathered by both, were wed@to Lord Marius, a man of a prestigious family…

group_1.textRight: It'd tie all three families nicely together!

group_1.textLeft: But this will turn around on us in two and@half years from now.
In the future I experienced, the three houses@lived in harmony together.
Lady Junia was betrothed to Lord Marius.
Um, um… They'll get engaged even though@they're so young?

group_1.textRight: It's typical for this era.

group_1.textLeft: Lord Marius was rather young, so it was@delayed for a time.
Once the engagement was decided,
Lord Marius's house moved forth as a major@supporter of new policies.
These were aimed to revitalize the town by@focusing on the local winemaking industry.

group_1.textRight: And Junia's family owns land and makes wine,@isn't that right?
…And Marius's house holds a strong influence@on the city council.
Pompeii's population was about 10,000 people…@Which would be the size of a town in our era.
In other words, the will of the council@determines the city's fate.

group_1.textLeft: In retrospect, there were many portents@of disaster.
The days where the earth shook gradually grew@in number. Some families thought of evacuating.
Had they known what would occur,@they would have left much sooner…

group_1.textRight: Just being prepared might've influenced@the outcome…

group_1.textLeft: …Yes.
In fact, even after the mountain exploded into@flame, the council was still reluctant to evacuate.
They simply couldn't bring themselves to@abandon a town that had recovered so well.
